name: COAST GUARD
description: Experience the extraordinary lives of coast guard officer Finn Asdair and his crew in COAST GUARD. Take on responsibility under the motto "Honor - Respect - Duty" and pursue dangerous criminals on the wide open sea.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 / 64-bit Processor: AMD Phenom II X3 2,8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 550 Ti DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Sound card Additional Notes: 32-bit operating systems are not supported
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 / 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K â€“ 4 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 - 2GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Sound card Additional Notes: 32-bit operating systems are not supported

reviews.review_text: This game runs poorly on AMD Radeon. One of the worst frame rate ever!! Had to run in 800x600 or less to get about 30fps. Graphic quality settings have little to no-effect on frame rates.   The fact that the developer or publisher doesn't even bother to mention Radeon in the System Requirements is indicative of their disdain and should be taken as a clear warning if you have Radeon GPU. Luckily i got this in a bundle so it's no big loss.  This game is very low on my to-play list. 2/10

This game is a terrible game. It is unintuitive, confusing, and the control and physics system is horrible. Upon closing the game(forcing it to close because it froze)I had a headache. The 'story', the last possible saving grace for it, was also pathetic and confusing.
Can't run over drowning people in my boat  0/10
